definitions.title: n.pr.m
definitions.body: Necho (II), king of Egypt (Egypt. Nkw, i.e (Steindorff:BAS i. 346 f.) Nekawō; As. Nikû Id.:ib. Schr:COT 2Ki 23:29 is grandfather of Bibl. Necho);—contemp. of Josiah and Nebuchad. [B.C. 611–605]: [[נְכוֹ]] 2Ch 35:20 (LXX qaraw Nexaw), [[נְכׂה]] 2Ch 35:22, 2Ch 36:4 (LXX qaraw Nexaw); [[פַּרְעׂה נְכוֹ]] Je 46:2, [[פַּרְעׂה נְכׂה]] 2Ki 23:29, 2Ki 23:33, 2Ki 23:34, 2Ki 23:35 (all LXX id.).
